snippet: A project to create a plant that glows in the dark, potentially leading the way for trees that can replace streetlamps, has been denounced for tinkering with genes.
abstract: Group of hobbyists and entrepreneurs begin project to develop plants that glow, potentially leading way for trees that can replace electric streetlamps and potted flowers to read by; project, which will use sophisticated form of genetic engineering called synthetic biology, is unique in that it is not sponsored by corporate or academic interests, and may give rise to similar do-it-yourself ventures.
lead_paragraph: A project to create a plant that glows in the dark, potentially leading the way for trees that can replace streetlamps, has been denounced for tinkering with genes.

headline.seo: A Dream of Glowing Trees Is Assailed for Gene-Tinkering
headline.main: A Dream of Trees Aglow at Night
headline.print_headline: A Dream of Trees Aglow at Night
